archiefmat.titel: Register van testamenten, codicillen en superscripties op besloten testamenten en codicillen. Geregistreerd 1707 - 1816
archiefmat.titel_eng: Register of last will and testaments, codicils and superscriptions on sealed last will and testaments and codicils. Registered in the period 1707 - 1816
archiefmat.notes:
Period: 1 January 1707 - 31 August 1815

 

No. 685 no longer exists: see no. 896; nos. 673, 680 and 683 are incomplete; nos. 673, 674, 676, 678-680 contain an alphabetical index of names.

The dates mentioned are the dates of registration, not the dates the original documents were drawn up.
